profile.deleteconfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your profile? All your data will be permanently lost and appointments booked after 3 days will be deleted!
register.agree1: I declare that I have read and understood the contents of the data management information (which you can access by clicking here), I agree with its content, and I voluntarily consent to the data management.
